titleStmt.title: Sentiment Analysis for Exploratory Data Analysis
titleStmt.author: Zoë Wilkinson Saldaña

sourceDesc.p: Born digital, in a markdown format. This lesson is original. Available translations are the following:

abstract.p: In this lesson you will learn to conduct 'sentiment analysis' on texts and to interpret the results. This is a form of exploratory data analysis based on natural language processing. You will learn to install all appropriate software and to build a reusable program that can be applied to your own texts.
